resources:
OceanEDU Press to Hear Animal Name Image Animal Name Description
//List of Animal Names for the Ocean Edu App
Dolphin
Seahorse
Sea Turtle
Shark
Octopus
Jellyfish
Lobster
Starfish
Orca or Killer Whale
Manta Ray
//List of ocean animal fun fact to go with each animal //https://www.natgeokids.com/nz/discover/animals/sea-life
Fun Fact: Dolphins live in groups of 5 to 15 called pods!
Fun Fact: Male seahorses carry their babies in a pouch called a brood pouch!
Fun Fact: Female sea turtles lay their eggs at the same nesting grounds where they were born!
Fun Fact: Sharks have no bones in their bodies!
Fun Fact: Octopuses have three hearts!
Fun Fact: Jellyfish have been around for millions of years!
Fun Fact: Lobsters shed their shells!
Fun Fact: Starfish can regrow damaged or lost arms!
Fun Fact: Orcas are huge animals, males can be 30 ft long!
Fun Fact: Manta Rays are known as the gentle giants of the sea!
